title: cant join qeue
body: An unexpected error has occurred while attempting to join the queue.

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is unstable or getting blocked from connecting to the matchmaking service.  Frequent errors can end up putting you in a low priority queue, so let's get this fixed up right away!  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get this fixed up!
